name: The Haunted (sad_apple)
description:
The Haunted is a short First-person horror and escape-room game.

Genre break-down:

- Escape-room: 50%

- Horror: 30%

- Puzzle: 20%

The player is required to unlock doors and puzzles in order to escape from the haunted house as well as run away from the ghost, which jumpscares the player.
